messages.subject: thanks, I'm  feeling better
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to everyone for the words of wisdom, good ideas and a shoulder to cry on.  I m feeling much better. I posted a request for field trip ideas on a local
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to everyone for the words of wisdom, good ideas and a shoulder
to cry on. I'm feeling much better.

I posted a request for field trip ideas on a local list and got lots
of good ones. I ordered some butterfly chrysalises. We plan on
starting an international lunch get together with another homeschool
family.

In general I feel like I have some focus and that it is fine if I do
the learning and introduce my kids to what I've learned. It will
enrich their lives in some way even if it is just the fact that I
cared enough to do it.

I'm not going to worry about the fact that they don't have the focus
(yet or never will?). I will still be making a happy, stimulating
environment for them to grow in.

Thanks again.

Pat
